title: Tacos With A Twist
instructions: Season the planted with a mix of cumin, smoked paprika, oregano, garlic powder, and a touch of cinnamon for depth.
Sauté the seasoned planted in a hot pan with oil until caramelized and slightly crispy, about 5-6 minutes.
Prepare the twist toppings: make a quick mango salsa with diced mango, red onion, jalapeño, cilantro, and lime juice.
Create a chipotle crema by mixing plant-based sour cream with chipotle peppers in adobo sauce.
Char corn tortillas over an open flame or in a dry pan until lightly blistered and warm.
Assemble tacos: layer shredded cabbage, the planted filling, mango salsa, and a drizzle of chipotle crema.
Garnish with fresh cilantro, a squeeze of lime, and crumbled queso fresco. Serve immediately.
